title: Frozen Keyboard
description: Swap the keys on a friend's keyboard to create confusion when they type.

title: Upside Down Screen
description: Use keyboard shortcuts to rotate your friend's computer screen upside down.

title: Airhorn Chair
description: Attach an airhorn to your friend's chair so it goes off when they sit down.

title: Fake Bug in Keyboard
description: Place a realistic-looking fake bug in your friend's keyboard to give them a scare.

title: Auto-correct Fun
description: Change your friend's phone auto-correct settings to replace common words with funny alternatives.

title: Desk Items in Jelly
description: Encase your friend's desk items like pens, stapler, etc. in jelly.

title: Mouse Prank
description: Swap the mouse buttons on your friend's computer or replace it with a similar-looking non-functional mouse.

title: Fake News Article
description: Create a fake news article about your friend and share it on social media.

title: Remote Control Swap
description: Swap the batteries in your friend's remote controls or replace them with dead batteries.

title: Alarm Clock Prank
description: Set multiple alarm clocks to go off at random times during the night in your friend's room.
